title: r/Maliciouscompliance Threaten Me? I'll Give You The Grade You Deserve!
description: r/Maliciouscompliance In today's episode, an angry parent approaches OP (a teacher) and demands that OP changes a student's grade. The guy is screaming at OP while OP is trying to direct traffic after school, which is dangerous and just plain inconsiderate. Eventually, OP relents and agrees to changes the kid's grade... to something worse!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
